price: Basi ilipo wajia Haki kutoka kwetu walisema: Hakika huu ni uchawi dhaahiri.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Ilipo dhihiri Haki yetu kwa mkono wa Musa, ule muujiza wa Musa - nao ni fimbo kugeuka nyoka mbele ya macho yao - wao walisema: Hakika huu ni uchawi ulio dhaahiri!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
